trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Adapters" /> namespace contains the base classes for control adapters and page adapters.
trans-unit.target: El espacio de nombres <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Adapters" /> contiene las clases base para los adaptadores de control y los adaptadores de página.

trans-unit.source: You can use these adapters to override the life-cycle states of pages and controls.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar estos adaptadores para invalidar los estados de ciclo de vida de páginas y controles.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to modify a control's markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: Esto es útil si desea modificar el marcado o el comportamiento de un control para nuevos estándares de marcado o para exploradores específicos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> hereda de la clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> clases heredan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> clase.
